document_data.name: Skeldagon
document_data.race: [[Archdevil]]Given that Nergal considers them rivals and cause for concern, and that they appear to be wandering Avernus as well, this article is written under the assumption that they are exiled archdevils.
document_data.Relationships: In {{yearlink|1372}}, [[Nergal (archdevil)|Nergal]] was concerned his captive, [[Elminster Aumar]], could wander into his domain, implying that Skeldagon was an extant rival at the time.
